snippet: Terry Collins said the sign that the Mets were reaching a new level would be when they won games like Monday's, when mistakes cost them a strong start by R.A. Dickey.
abstract: Terry Collins said the sign that the Mets were reaching a new level would be when they won games like Monday's, when mistakes cost them a strong start by R.A. Dickey.

headline.main: Collins Says Mets Must Learn Quickly to Reach Next Level
